Databricks

Databricks ML Engineer Intern (Remote) 2026

Build ML tooling, pipelines, and demos on Lakehouse at Databricks in a remote internship.

CompanyDatabricks
RoleML Engineer Intern
LocationRemote
Duration12-16 weeks
StipendExpected/Indicative: USD 5k–7k/month
Work Hours40 hours/week
Employment TypeIntern
Experience0-2 years

Eligibility & Skills

  • Students/new grads with Python, ML, and data engineering basics
  • Education: B.S./M.S. in CS/DS/Stats/Math or related
  • Branches allowed: Computer Science, Information Technology, Mathematics, Statistics
  • Skills: Python/PySpark, ML modeling, Data pipelines, Cloud basics
  • Year of study: 2026/2027 grads
  • Age limit: Per company policy

What you will work on

  • Build ML pipelines and feature engineering on the Lakehouse stack.
  • Create demos/notebooks showcasing GenAI/ML capabilities.
  • Improve tooling for experimentation and monitoring.

What makes you a fit

  1. Python/ML experience with solid data foundations.
  2. Familiarity with PySpark/SQL and cloud basics.
  3. Communication skills for distributed teams.

Interview stages

  • Recruiter screen.
  • Technical coding/ML round.
  • Systems/data design discussion.
  • Offer with stipend and remote onboarding.

Ready to apply?

Applications close on 18 March 2026.
